# coronavirus-plot
## Version: 1.0.11
## Install:
`pip3 install coronavirus-plot`


## Run:
`python3 -m coronavirus-plot`


## Requirements:

* python3
  * console-menu >= 0.6.0
  * matplotlib >= 3.2.1
  * requests >= 2.22.0

## Resources:

* [CSSEGISandData / COVID-19](https://github.com/CSSEGISandData/COVID-19/tree/master/csse_covid_19_data/csse_covid_19_time_series)
